mapper.select: SELECT ino,title,sub_title,company,department,name,TO_CHAR(idate, 'YY-MM-DD') AS idate,hit,poster,num FROM (SELECT ino,title,sub_title,company,department,name,idate,hit,poster,rownum as num FROM (SELECT /*+ INDEX_ASC(INTERVIEW PK_INTERVIEW)*/ino,title,sub_title,company,department,name,idate,hit,poster FROM INTERVIEW)) WHERE NUM BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT i.ino, i.title, i.sub_title, i.company, i.department, i.name, TO_CHAR(i.idate, 'YY-MM-DD') AS idate, i.hit, i.poster, job.name AS job_name, num FROM (SELECT i.*, rownum as num FROM (SELECT ino, title, sub_title, company, department, name, idate, hit, poster FROM INTERVIEW ORDER BY ino ASC)i)i JOIN INTERVIEW_TYPE it ON i.ino = it.ino JOIN JOB job ON it.jno = job.jno WHERE it.jno=#{type}
SELECT ino, title, sub_title, company, department, name, TO_CHAR(idate, 'YY-MM-DD') AS idate, hit, poster FROM INTERVIEW ORDER BY ino ASC
